knimeNode.name: JEmboss Processor (local)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Runs an EMBOSS command on the local computer, based on the configure-dialog settings. Input data is taken from the input table and automatically converted into a suitable form for EMBOSS based on the chosen program.

fullDescription.intro: Runs an EMBOSS command on the local computer, based on the configure-dialog settings. Input data is taken from the input table and automatically converted into a suitable form for EMBOSS based on the chosen program. It has only been tested with the windows binary (mEMBOSS) version 6.3.1 as downloaded via the EMBOSS website
fullDescription.option: Once chosen, the parameters for the chosen program can be customised
In some cases, increasing this value can improve performance
